mapper.sql: mpmo.matching_order_id, mpmo.matching_order_code, mpmo.matching_id, mpmo.work_order_card_pool_id, mpmo.matching_staff_id, mpmo.matching_quantity, mpmo.`status`, mpmo.remark, mpmo.organization_id, mpmo.create_user_id, mpmo.create_time, mpmo.modified_user_id, mpmo.modified_time, mpmo.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name as create_user_name,sus.user_name as modified_user_name, swocp.work_order_card_id, swo.work_order_id, swo.work_order_code, sm.material_id, sm.material_code, sm.material_desc,sm.material_name, btt.main_unit, mpm.min_matching_quantity,mpm.already_matching_quantity,mpm.work_order_quantity,mpm.production_quantity, spm.product_model_name, suss.user_name AS matching_staff_name, sd.dept_name from mes_pm_matching_order mpmo LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON mpmo.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON mpmo.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user suss ON mpmo.matching_staff_id = suss.user_id LEFT JOIN smt_dept sd ON suss.dept_id = sd.dept_id LEFT JOIN mes_pm_matching mpm ON mpmo.matching_id = mpm.matching_id LEFT JOIN smt_work_order_card_pool swocp ON mpmo.work_order_card_pool_id = swocp.work_order_card_pool_id LEFT JOIN smt_work_order swo ON swocp.work_order_id = swo.work_order_id LEFT JOIN smt_material sm ON swo.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_tab btt ON sm.material_id = btt.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_storage_material ssm ON sm.material_id = ssm.material_id LEFT JOIN smt_product_model spm ON btt.product_model_id = spm.product_model_id
and date_format(mpmo.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and swo.work_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCode}, '%')
and swocp.work_order_card_id like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCardId}, '%')
and mpmo.matching_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{matchingOrderCode}, '%')
and mpmo.status= #{status}
order by mpmo.create_time desc
